content: 12 of puff twice then rnds 1 4 once more begin crown decreases round 1 decrease *k1tbl k1 puff right k2 k1tbl k2 puff left k1 k1tbl s2kp k1tbl k3 k1tbl k3 k1tbl s2kp repeat from * around 110 sts 20 sts decrease d 10 sts increase d round 2 decrease *k1tbl k2tog k2 mb k2 ssk k1tbl k1 k1tbl k3 twice k1tbl k1 repeat from * around 100 sts round 3 * k1tbl k3 twice k1tbl k1 repeat from * around round 4 decrease *k1tbl s2kp k1tbl s2kp k1tbl k1 k1tbl k3 twice k1tbl k1 repeat from * around 80 sts round 5 * k1tbl k1 3 times k1tbl k3 twice k1tbl k1 repeat from * 3 times more k1tbl k1 3 times k1tbl k3 twice sl 2 sts decrease onto rh ndl as if to k remove m round 6 decrease k1 p2sso from prev round slip st just worked onto lh ndl replace m slip st back onto rh ndl k1 k1tbl k1 s2kp k3 k1tbl k3 *s2kp k1 k1tbl k1 s2kp k3 k1tbl k3 repeat from * 3 times more 60 sts round 7 * k1tbl k1 3 times puff right k2 k1tbl k2 puff left k1 repeat from * around 70 sts round 8 decrease *k1tbl s2kp k1tbl k2tog k2 mb k2 ssk repeat from * around 50 sts round 9 *k1tbl k1 k1tbl k3 k1tbl k3 repeat around round 10 decrease *s2kp k3 k1tbl k3 repeat from * around 40 sts round 11 *k1tbl k3 k1tbl k3 repeat from * around round 12 decrease *k1tbl s2kp repeat from * around 20 sts round 13 *k1tbl k1 repeat from * around round 14 decrease *k2tog repeat from * around 10 sts ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 4 share with us follow us on instagram @kelbournewoolens and show us your projects using the hashtags #kelbournewoolens #kwyearofhats ©2019 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved images © linette kielinski v 1 4 15 19 not to be reproduced or re-knit for sale or profit 5
